creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 33376
ModFcgid documentation improvements

Hi Apache devs!

On httpd-users@ it has been asked why sometimes mod-fastcgid and Apache's ErrorDocuments are not working properly. The misconception is similar to mod-proxy when people don't know about ProxyErrorOverride. I added a section to mod-fcgid's documentation to improve the docs.

To test that my changes were good, I did:

1) svn checkout http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/httpd/mod_fcgid/trunk mod_fcgid
2) modified the documentation
3) copied the files to the httpd-trunk repository to leverage the build docs scripts
4) built the docs and ran validate-xhtml/validate-xml
5) checked on my browser

Let me know if you like the idea or if I wrote something terribly wrong (in case I'll amend my patch with the best answer).

Thanks!

Luca

creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
